files.pubspec.yaml:
name: fitnesstracker
description: A Flutter application to track fitness activities and progress.
version: 1.0.0+1

environment:
  sdk: ">=2.12.0 <3.0.0"

dependencies:
  flutter:
    sdk: flutter
  cupertino_icons: ^1.0.2
  provider: ^6.0.0
  http: ^0.13.3
  shared_preferences: ^2.0.6

dev_dependencies:
  flutter_test:
    sdk: flutter

flutter:
  uses-material-design: true
  assets:
    - assets/images/
    - assets/icons/
